name: VIDEO: New Track and Field For Justice-Involved Youths
description: The San Diego Probation department celebrates the opening of a new track and field to the East Mesa Juvenile Detention Facility. The $1.5 million dollar outdoor sports area allows justice-involved youth a chance to exercise and play competitive sports.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: The San Diego Probation department celebrates the opening of a new track and field to the East Mesa Juvenile Detention Facility. The $1.5 million dollar outdoor sports area allows justice-involved youth a chance to exercise and play competitive sports.
